explanation: [0-0] In a room, a young man in a red shirt is smiling and looking to the left. He raises his right hand in front of his chest, holding a black object in his hand. At the bottom of the screen, there are black words "Spider-Man Becomes Ghost" on a white background.

[0-2] Then the man raises the black spider in his hand, opens his mouth, and reveals a surprised expression. Then he quickly swings his arm, throws the spider away, and then holds his right wrist with his left hand. Then the screen switches to the ground, where a black spider is moving on the floor.

[0-2] Then the man raises the black spider in his hand, opens his mouth, and reveals a surprised expression. Then he quickly swings his arm, throws the spider away, and then holds his right wrist with his left hand. Then the screen switches to the ground, where a black spider is moving on the floor.

[2-4] Immediately afterward, the screen switches to the interior of a room, where a young man with glasses and a blue shirt is holding the door frame with his right hand. He leans forward slightly, his mouth wide open, his eyes wide open, his expression excited.

[2-4] Immediately afterward, the screen switches to the interior of a room, where a young man with glasses and a blue shirt is holding the door frame with his right hand. He leans forward slightly, his mouth wide open, his eyes wide open, his expression excited.

[4-6] Then the screen switches back to the man in the red shirt, who is looking up with his mouth open and eyes wide, his pupils emitting white light. Then the picture switches back to the man with glasses and a blue shirt, who is holding his glasses with his hand, his expression surprised. Then he takes off his glasses and says something.

[4-6] Then the screen switches back to the man in the red shirt, who is looking up with his mouth open and eyes wide, his pupils emitting white light. Then the picture switches back to the man with glasses and a blue shirt, who is holding his glasses with his hand, his expression surprised. Then he takes off his glasses and says something.

[6-8] Afterwards, the screen switches to a black leather sofa, where the man in the red shirt is lying unconscious with his eyes closed, covered in white smoke effects. Then the man's image becomes transparent, and a "ghost" with the same appearance as him but with white eyes appears above him.

[6-8] Afterwards, the screen switches to a black leather sofa, where the man in the red shirt is lying unconscious with his eyes closed, covered in white smoke effects. Then the man's image becomes transparent, and a "ghost" with the same appearance as him but with white eyes appears above him.

[8-14] Then the screen switches to the man in the blue shirt, his arms turning green. Then the screen switches back to the man in the red shirt who is looking up, who has transformed into a "ghost" form with white eyes and a wicked smile. Then the screen switches back to the man in the blue shirt, who turns completely green, his expression angry, and roars with his mouth wide open. Then the screen switches to the man in the red shirt in "ghost" form, who reaches out his right hand and shoots out white spider webs. Red text "SUBSCRIBE" appears on a white background at the bottom of the screen. Finally, the screen switches to the man in the blue shirt, who is trapped on the wall by the white spider webs. The web becomes denser and denser until the man disappears on the wall, leaving only the white spider web.
